title: The Reformation: age of revolt
creator_credit: Paul Asselin, Signet Productions and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: This film consists mainly of role playing by major contestants in the Reformation: Luther, Pope Hadrian, Erasmus, Emperor Charles, John Calvin and others. Each put their case quoting statements from their writings. Also includes a dramatisation of the Peasants’ War and contemporary sketches and drawings. Suitable for secondary level.
